headline: Have a Frightfully Fun, Safely Done Halloween
summary: Halloween is creeping up fast! Costumes and candy may steal the show, but safety is the real hero. From decking out your home to guiding little goblins on their candy quest, these tips from FirstEnergy Corp. (NYSE: FE) can help keep the holiday spooky and safe.

headline: FirstEnergy (FE): Valuation Insights After Unveiling New Power Plant and Grid Modernization Plan
summary: FirstEnergy (FE) is taking center stage this week after announcing a long-term Integrated Resource Plan with big implications for West Virginia’s energy mix. The plan highlights a new 1,200-MW natural gas power plant, continued coal operations, and further grid modernization. See our latest analysis for FirstEnergy. FirstEnergy’s latest moves, including the upcoming gas plant and ongoing grid upgrades, have captured the market’s attention. Momentum has clearly picked up, with a 7% share price...

headline: FirstEnergy's 1,200-MW Gas Plant Initiative Could Be a Game Changer for FE
summary: FirstEnergy Corp. recently announced plans to build a new 1,200-MW natural gas-fired power plant in West Virginia as part of its long-term Integrated Resource Plan, which also involves extending coal plant operations, investing in renewables, and strengthening grid reliability to support state capacity goals through 2050. This major initiative underscores FirstEnergy's focus on future infrastructure, reliable power supply, and long-term job creation, responding to both regulatory mandates...
